text: "Joy to the World" is a 1971 song by American band Three Dog Night. It was taken from their fourth studio album Naturally. It went to number 1 in the United States, South Africa and Canada, number 24 in the United Kingdom, number 25 in the Netherlands, number 12 in New Zealand and number 8 in Australia. It was covered by Little Richard in 1971. It was used in the 1994 movie Forrest Gump. ==References== Category:1971 songs Category:Rock songs Category:Three Dog Night songs Category:Little Richard songs
title: Joy to the World (Three Dog Night song)
